#  -----------
# | HOSTNAMES |
#  -----------
# How to specify hostnames for VIP addresses in the long run is still a question. The issue is:
# The owner of the VIP addresses is eVIP. The owner of the '/etc/hosts' file is LDEwS. LDEwS does not provide runtime SPI to define hostnames.
# On explicit request from Henrik Persson, the 'sed' eVIP startup commands have been removed from the evipcfg.xml file
host all 10.80.103.178 platform-vip
host all 10.80.103.179 tasvip4
host all 10.80.103.180 ut-vip4
host all 10.80.103.181 cai3g-vip4
host all 10.80.103.182 sigtran1-vip4
host all 10.80.103.183 sigtran2-vip4
host all 2001:1B70:8294:3d00::4160 platform-vip6
host all 2001:1B70:8294:3d00::4161 tasvip6
host all 2001:1B70:8294:3d00::4162 ut-vip6
host all 2001:1B70:8294:3d00::4163 cai3g-vip6
host all 2001:1B70:8294:3d00::4164 sigtran1-vip6
host all 2001:1B70:8294:3d00::4165 sigtran2-vip6

#  ----------------
# | Other settings |
#  ----------------
# Define DNS servers
dns control 10.51.40.100
dns control 10.51.40.101
dns control 10.64.73.100
dns control 10.64.73.101

# Define NTP servers
ntp 10.51.40.102
ntp 10.51.40.103
ntp 10.64.73.102
ntp 10.64.73.103

# Define time zone
# See https://www.suse.com/LinuxPackages/packageRouter.jsp?product=server&version=11&service_pack=sp3&architecture=x86_64&package_name=timezone for supported time zones
timezone Europe/Stockholm

#   ========================================================
# || SITE SPECIFIC AND SOLUTION INTEGRATION PARAMETERS, END ||
#   ========================================================
#   ======================================================
# || INTERNAL PARAMETERS, START (_DO NOT_ TOUCH THEM !!!) ||
# || (See <doc number> for further details.)              ||
#   ======================================================
#  --------------
# | TIPC Network |
#  --------------
tipc all dynamic eth0

#  ---------------
# | INET Networks |
#  ---------------
network default 0.0.0.0/0
network default6 0::0/0

network internal 169.254.100.0/24
# .1   - SC-1
# .2   - SC-2
# .3   - PL-3
# ...
# .99  - PL-99
# .100 - PL-100
# ...
# .249 - SS7 CAF CP-M MIP
# .250 - BOOT B MIP
# .251 - BOOT A MIP
# .252 - NFS MIP
# .253 - ARP target 2 (Not used in a Cloud environment, but still reserved for unified address plan)
# .254 - ARP target 1 (Not used in a Cloud environment, but still reserved for unified address plan)
# .255 - Broadcast

network sysmgmt 169.254.101.0/24
network sysmgmt6 fd00:0:a9fe:6500::0/64
# .1   / ::1    - SC-1
# .2   / ::2    - SC-2
# ...
# .253 / ::fffd - Muta MIP
# .254 / ::fffe - Gateway
# .255 / NA     - Broadcast

#  ----------------
# | INET Addresses |
#  ----------------
ip all eth0 internal dynamic
ip all eth1 sysmgmt dynamic
ip all eth1 sysmgmt6 dynamic

#  --------------------
# | INET MIP ADDRESSES |
#  --------------------
# NFS
interface control eth0:1 alias
mip control nfs eth0:1 internal 169.254.100.252

# BOOT
interface control eth0:2 alias
mip control boot_a eth0:2 internal 169.254.100.251
interface control eth0:3 alias
mip control boot_b eth0:3 internal 169.254.100.250

# SS7 CAF CP-M Address
interface payload eth0:4 alias
mip payload ss7cafcpmaddress eth0:4 internal 169.254.100.249

# Muta
interface all eth1:1 alias
mip all muta_mip eth1:1 sysmgmt 169.254.101.253
interface all eth1:2 alias
mip all muta_mip6 eth1:2 sysmgmt6 fd00:0:a9fe:6500::fffd

#  --------
# | ROUTES |
#  --------
# The below specified IPv6 default route is not supported by LDE for the moment. Linux equivalent is:
# ip -6 route add default via <gateway> dev <device>
# As long as fully specified IPv6 default route cannot be set in cluster.conf, a workaround is applied in evipcfg.xml
route control default gateway 169.254.101.254
# route control default6 gateway fd00:0:a9fe:6500::fffe interface eth1

#  ----------------
# | Other settings |
#  ----------------
nfs 169.254.100.252
boot 169.254.100.251
boot 169.254.100.250
scaling 169.254.100.129 169.254.100.240
nodegroup scaling-template 3 4

# ssh listening networks (default listening on all)
ssh payload internal
shutdown-timeout all 120

# Disable quick reboot of "VMs"
quick-reboot all off

#   ==========================
# || INTERNAL PARAMETERS, END ||
#   ==========================
